content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'corner2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a right-angled groove part with the user's gaze indicated by a red circle at the corner. The groove orientation extends horizontally to the right and then vertically downward.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 250, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
